summary: An FBI Guardian Complaint Form documenting an online tip submitted on July 25, 2021, where an anonymous individual reports being a victim of child sex trafficking by Ghislaine Maxwell from 1987 to the present. The tipster expresses fear of threats to themselves and their family and requests to speak in person to an investigator with counsel.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named in the case synopsis for child sex trafficking; the tip is related to his case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The tipster explicitly names her as the person who trafficked them as a child, citing years of trauma and threats.

connections.description: The document is a tip related to the Jeffrey Epstein child sex trafficking case, implicating Maxwell as a trafficker within that context.
The tipster reports being trafficked as a child by Ghislaine Maxwell, alleging years of trauma and threats.

events.title: FBI Online Tip Submission
events.description: An anonymous individual submits an online tip to the FBI National Threat Operations Center (NTOC) via tips.fbi.gov, reporting being a victim of child sex trafficking by Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Alleged Trafficking Period Begins
events.description: The tipster indicates the period of their alleged victimization by Ghislaine Maxwell began in 1987.

keyFacts: An anonymous tipster contacted the FBI in July 2021, alleging they were trafficked as a child by Ghislaine Maxwell.
The alleged trafficking period is stated as "1987 to Present," indicating a claim of long-term victimization.
The tipster reports ongoing threats to themselves and their immediate family, including children.
The tipster requests to speak in person to an investigator with legal counsel, suggesting a desire to provide formal testimony.
The FBI's internal database queries for 'Ghislaine Maxwell' returned multiple results, linking this tip to existing case files.
